page.title: 15Holwell - Journeys
page.content: JOURNEYS TO WORK - One person from our sample travels 150 miles by rail once a week. The rest use cars. The furthest daily mileage is 120 ,coming down to 2 miles by bicycle. Only one travels the United Kingdom. JOURNEYS TO DOCTOR AND DENTIST - from 6 to 30 miles, but most travel 6-8 miles.Nearly every family has a car,and some have two or three. SHOPPING - Almost everyone shops at the nearest towns,6-30 miles away. Few buy groceries at the village shop but use the post office part for pensions,stamps,etc. BUSES - There are work buses to Yeovil Dorchester and Sherborne.Shopping buses go to Sturminster Newton on Mon- days, Yeovil on Tuesdays, Dorchester on Wednesdays, Sherborne on Thursdays and Yeovil on Saturdays.
